snippet: With Facebook and Twitter buttons built into at least one fifth of the most popular Web sites, a variety of free browser tools allow users to turn off tracking by social networks on the rest of the Web.
abstract: With Facebook and Twitter buttons built into at least one fifth of the most popular Web sites, a variety of free browser tools allow users to turn off tracking by social networks on the rest of the Web.

headline.main: Browser Tools Can Help Block Tracking by Social Networks
